bibl.title: Menches, Komogrammateus of Kerkeosiris. The Doings and Dealings of a Village Scribe in the Late Ptolemaic Period (120-110 B.C.).
bibl.note: I. The Tebtynis Papyri. - II. Crocodiles and Papyrus. - III. Wastepaper Archive. - IV. Menches, Village Scribe. - V. Menches and Company. - VI. Menches at Work. - VII. Menches and His Time. - VIII. Conclusions. Appendices. Bibliography. Indices. - Publishes 4 texts from the Bancroft Library, Berkeley: 1. The cursive version of P. Tebt. I, 164, September/October 112 B.C.; - 2. Small report of Crown land sown, 4 December 114 B.C.; - 3. Account of Workmen, 99 B.C; - 4. List of Landholders from Kerkeosiris, c.114/113?
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Tebt. Verhoogt 1-4 145.4 P. Tebt. I; IV
VERHOOGT A.M.F.W., Menches, Komogrammateus of Kerkeosiris. The Doings and Dealings of a Village Scribe in the Late Ptolemaic Period (120-110 B.C.). (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXIX.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1998, 4Â°, xiii-242 pp., 21 tabl. et 7 pll. ISBN 90-04-10926-9.

I. The Tebtynis Papyri. - II. Crocodiles and Papyrus. - III. Wastepaper Archive. - IV. Menches, Village Scribe. - V. Menches and Company. - VI. Menches at Work. - VII. Menches and His Time. - VIII. Conclusions. Appendices. Bibliography. Indices. - Publishes 4 texts from the Bancroft Library, Berkeley: 1. The cursive version of P. Tebt. I, 164, September/October 112 B.C.; - 2. Small report of Crown land sown, 4 December 114 B.C.; - 3. Account of Workmen, 99 B.C; - 4. List of Landholders from Kerkeosiris, c.114/113?
